D

DAO - Interface in com.github.jlynx
This interface defines methods to persist and retrieve POJOs from relational databases systems (RDBMS), and to fetch results as Java objects.
DAOImpl - Class in com.github.jlynx
Implementation of DAO interface.

S

save() - Method in interface com.github.jlynx.DAO
Saves POJO to database; equivalent to update() if record exists or insert() if record does not exist.
save() - Method in class com.github.jlynx.DAOImpl
 
saveNulls(boolean) - Method in interface com.github.jlynx.DAO
Whether null should be preserved in UPDATE and INSERT statements; by default NULL property values are removed from the statement.
